name: Blaze-Boy and The Ignition Point
description:
Escape from the lab!

Blaze Boy is a fast-paced action game where you must use your agility and fireballs to escape a lab filled with deadly enemies like Mr. Ice Guy and Saul Farts the Lab Cop. Your health depletes when you move or protect yourself, so be careful! Shoot your fireballs at enemies and obstacles to clear a path to safety and find the shortest routes

You'll need quick reflexes and strategic thinking to make it through all the levels. Can you make it to the end and escape the lab?
